title: Congress Passes Biden's Trillion-Dollar Transit, Broadband, And Power Bill
description:
It is a major political victory for President Biden, though it remains to be seen whether it will buoy his approval ratings or boost support for Democrats in Congress.

This episode: White House correspondent Scott Detrow, national political correspondent Mara Liasson, and acting congressional correspondent Deirdre Walsh.
